io.geeny.prettyprint

Class PrettyPrint

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.geeny.prettyprint.PrettyPrint

  • public class PrettyPrint
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper io.geeny.util to print lines based on the setup of how big the console output shall be
    Version:
    1.7
    Author:
    Marco Bierbach

      • PrettyPrint

        public PrettyPrint(int _textLength,
                   int _padding,
                   PrettyPrintConst.PRINT_TYPE _printType,
                   java.lang.String _toolPath)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        _textLength - int length of the text
        _padding - int padding to the borders
        _printType - enum PRINT_TYPE print type which defines what pretty print shall do with messages
        _toolPath - string path used by the tool who uses pretty print

      • PrettyPrint

        Parameters:
        _printType - print type which defines what pretty print shall do with messages
